dict.string: I was born in a small country in central Europe. My birth coincided with the war for Slovenian independence.
I got my first PC at age 6. It was my parent's gift to me for New Year's Eve and it ran Microsoft Windows 95.
I finished primary school with the highest GPA possible and was awarded a scholarship for gifted students.
My first interaction with a Mac was in my high school years and it drove me into iOS development.
Sabina, my girlfriend of 5 years, supports me at everything I do and sticks with me through my all-nighters.
I graduated from one of the best high schools in my country while still maintaining my Zois scholarship.
I released my first iOS app only a few months after I started to learn how to programme.
Downloads of my apps started to grow and my user base quickly grew over half a million users in just a few months.
I visited California and I was amazed! I can't wait to go across the pond again.
So... What do I do now?
Currently, I'm involved with two startups, still working on my own apps and getting my masters degree.
